displayName.text: Park Plaza Dermatology: Dr Pinkas E Lebovits MD, PC

formattedAddress: 286 Fort Washington Ave #1c, New York, NY 10032, USA
adrFormatAddress: 286 Fort Washington Ave #1c, New York, NY 10032, USA

originalText.text:
Would have given it a minus
-5 if could. PA Louis Lam misdiagnosed a patient, making the patient undergo a wrong rigid regimen for over two weeks, in spite of the patients‚Äô repeated complaints of worsening, without even taking a biopsy. When finally admitting to his misdiagnosis, Lam yet didn‚Äôt utter a word of apology. Even the nurses in the office were appalled by this conduct. The medical consequences were devastating and irreversible: the patient‚Äôs condition became quickly and progressively worse within days of the regimen, and stayed that way ever since. Professional dermatologists were shocked, calling Lam‚Äôs actions outrageously negligent. Calls for a lawsuit but the patient should avoid any stress, like you should avoid that office and that ‚Äúdoctor‚Äù.

originalText.text: I was there this Monday and took my son for dark neck and arm picks. He didn‚Äôt even exam him well or have him take his shirt off. He just told me he has to go on a diet. I have never experience someone so off tp get rid of us. How can you assume without examine someone. My doctor warn me that it‚Äôs a hit and miss there sometimes you can get someone good or the opposite. My bad luck I got the worse dermatologist will never go back and will warn everyone not to go there. Terrible bed manners

originalText.text: I been coming here for months and my experience since the first day I came has been great. Friendly staff, great and fast service. My acne has gotten way better too, I would recommend this dermatologist to a friend.
